name: test_e2e_with_logs[281_CMD_ADV_058]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_ADV_058` |
| **Name** | Semicolon Sleep Injection |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; sleep 5`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20sleep%205`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~41000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:45:17.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_ADV_058-1770821117909-ejaw24 pattern_id=CMD_ADV_058 uri=/?q=%3B%20sleep%205 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_ADV_058-1770821117909-ejaw24 pattern_id=CMD_ADV_058 uri=/?q=%3B%20sleep%205 client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
